content.html: A brief explanation of my ethical stance on crypto bros A. Crypto is unethical B. Crypto bros either believe that it is ethical or do not care that it is unethical C. From A and B it follows that crypto bros are unethical
content.value:
A brief explanation of my ethical stance on crypto bros

A. Crypto is unethical
B. Crypto bros either believe that it is ethical or do not care that it is unethical
C. From A and B it follows that crypto bros are unethical
